name: Chimp Chase: NFT Theft Simulator
description:
"The year is 20XX. Crypto is declining along with our society..."

Run around a collapsing city and steal JPEGs of chimps from dorks by swinging a big net at them. I made this game from scratch in just under a month for fun.

Music by @NotDamare on Twitter.

- - -

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera

Left Click - Swing Net
